医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究强调美国治疗儿童流感的抗病毒药物的使用情况存在差异且成本不断上升儿科研究分析了美国流感儿童和青少年抗病毒药物使用的趋势，揭示了配药率和成本的显着差异，以及六岁以下儿童的使用率较低，强调需要改进治疗策略。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231116/Study-highlights-variable-use-and-rising-costs-of-antivirals-in-treating-pediatric-influenza-in-the-US.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231116/Study-highlights-variable-use-and-rising-costs-of-antivirals-in-treating-pediatric-influenza-in-the-US.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=645fd6f8-8b8c-4736-abd1-68bdbb74315d Thu, 16 Nov 2023 21:24:00 -0500 Study highlights variable use and rising costs of antivirals in treating pediatric influenza in the U.S.
母亲吸烟可降低儿童 1 型糖尿病风险，成年后影响逐渐消失《柳叶刀》欧洲地区健康研究发现，母亲在怀孕期间吸烟可能会降低儿童患 1 型糖尿病的风险，但这种保护作用在成年后会减弱，成人吸烟对 1 型糖尿病风险没有显着影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231116/Maternal-smoking-linked-to-reduced-childhood-type-1-diabetes-risk-effects-fade-in-adulthood.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231116/Maternal-smoking-linked-to-reduced-childhood-type-1-diabetes-risk-effects-fade-in-adulthood.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3e9e90a7-2b46-4369-8bfe-5cec5db62e79 Thu, 16 Nov 2023 21:02:00 -0500 Maternal smoking linked to reduced childhood type 1 diabetes risk, effects fade in adulthood
阿尔茨海默病小鼠模型中的光生物调节缺乏预防作用研究评估了光生物调节 (PBM) 治疗在阿尔茨海默病小鼠模型中的有效性，发现对行为表现或神经退行性疾病没有显着影响，这表明需要进一步研究 PBM 的治疗潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231116/Photobiomodulation-in-Alzheimers-mouse-model-falls-short-in-preventive-impact.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231116/Photobiomodulation-in-Alzheimers-mouse-model-falls-short-in-preventive-impact.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d265b5a3-aea5-46de-a3e2-5dba03e1f640 Thu, 16 Nov 2023 20:43:00 -0500 Photobiomodulation in Alzheimer's mouse model falls short in preventive impact
探索 nirmatrelvir 和双膦酸盐在 COVID-19 治疗和免疫中的双重作用该综述研究了 nirmatrelvir 和双磷酸盐在治疗 COVID-19 中的作用，揭示了它们对 SARS-CoV-2 特异性适应性免疫的影响以及减轻严重感染的潜力，强调了平衡的长期免疫管理的必要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231116/Exploring-the-dual-role-of-nirmatrelvir-and-bisphonates-in-COVID-19-treatment-and-immunity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231116/Exploring-the-dual-role-of-nirmatrelvir-and-bisphonates-in-COVID-19-treatment-and-immunity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=85b08d10-9b2c-4188-a9d9-2690b32f12f5 Thu, 16 Nov 2023 17:29:00 -0500 Exploring the dual role of nirmatrelvir and bisphosphonates in COVID-19 treatment and immunity
研究发现，产前接触大麻会增加不良出生结果的风险根据今天发表在科学杂志《成瘾》上的一项研究，与未产前接触过大麻的婴儿相比，产前接触过大麻的婴儿更有可能早产、出生体重较低，并且需要新生儿重症监护病房 (NICU) 护理。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231116/Prenatal-cannabis-exposure-increases-risk-of-adverse-birth-outcomes-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231116/Prenatal-cannabis-exposure-increases-risk-of-adverse-birth-outcomes-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c2d89882-8564-42a0-902c-85252ebe61bf Thu, 16 Nov 2023 15:01:24 -0500 Prenatal cannabis exposure increases risk of adverse birth outcomes, study finds
昼夜节律休息活动模式可能预示着老年人的虚弱风险布里格姆研究人员发现，昼夜休息活动节律的改变与老年人衰弱的风险之间存在关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231116/Circadian-rest-activity-patterns-may-signal-frailty-risk-in-older-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231116/Circadian-rest-activity-patterns-may-signal-frailty-risk-in-older-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2d35040c-3818-4ca2-a69d-94fbe6a4419f Thu, 16 Nov 2023 14:48:57 -0500 Circadian rest-activity patterns may signal frailty risk in older adults
AI 模型预测多种癌症类型的患者结果加州大学洛杉矶分校健康琼森综合癌症中心的研究人员开发了一种基于表观遗传因素的人工智能 (AI) 模型，该模型能够成功预测多种癌症类型的患者结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231116/AI-model-predicts-病人-结果-across-multiple-cancer-types.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231116/AI-model-predicts-病人-结果-across-multiple-cancer-types.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a3fceb0f-ee38-499b-b8a6-e6b9f7c16bbf Thu, 16 Nov 2023 14:42:20 -0500 AI model predicts patient outcomes across multiple cancer types
共同应对抗菌素耐药性：与 Beverley Isherwood 博士的对话贝弗利·伊舍伍德博士的采访。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231116/Tackling-Antimicrobial-Resistance-Together-A-Conversation-with-Dr-Beverley-Isherwood.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231116/Tackling-Antimicrobial-Resistance-Together-A-Conversation-with-Dr-Beverley-Isherwood.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=790ec18c-5db3-44c6-b9a5-95d54aea9e23 Thu, 16 Nov 2023 10:37:00 -0500 Tackling Antimicrobial Resistance Together: A Conversation with Dr. Beverley Isherwood
MaxCyte 作为创始成员加入 mRNA 药物联盟 (AMM) MaxCyte, Inc. 是一家专注于细胞工程的领先公司，提供支持平台技术，以推进下一代细胞疗法和创新生物加工应用的发现、开发和商业化，今天宣布它已加入 mRNA 药物联盟 ( AMM），作为创始成员。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231116/MaxCyte-Joins-the-Alliance-for-mRNA-Medicines-(AMM)-as-a-founding-member.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231116/MaxCyte-Joins-the-Alliance-for-mRNA-Medicines-(AMM)-as-a-founding-member.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2f3ddc30-ce04-4cc7-adbd-5f136cbc81fa Thu, 16 Nov 2023 09:15:00 -0500 MaxCyte joins the Alliance for mRNA Medicines (AMM) as a founding member
东欧和黑海盆地新出现的蜱传病毒威胁来自东欧和黑海地区国家的蜱虫样本。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231116/Emerging-tick-borne-viral-threats-in-eastern-europe-and-the-black-sea-basin.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231116/Emerging-tick-borne-viral-threats-in-eastern-europe-and-the-black-sea-basin.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=093908c0-fa61-40a0-9377-9d06fb3bbdb4 Thu, 16 Nov 2023 09:08:00 -0500 Emerging tick-borne viral threats in eastern europe and the black sea basin
